author: henning
msg: Start up Velocity by initializing the SimpleLog4j logging system and
accessing the velocity logging facility. Which ends up in the velocity.log
like before.

author: henning
msg: Moved direct LogService reference to commons-logging

author: henning
msg: TurbineResources is now only a facade class for accessing the
Configuration object available from Turbine.getConfiguration()
This class should disappear a little later.
Removed everything else from the resources package (no longer needed).

author: henning
msg: Convert TurbineResources References to direct Configuration access

author: henning
msg: - cleaned up Service Manager code
- added explicit Configuration Object which replaces TurbineResources
- logging now commons-logging
- some typos and style fixes
- load configuration Turbine-3.0 like
- immediate Log initialization after loading the configuration
- Initialize commons-logging to be using Log4j and start up Log4j
- load turbine startup variables from web.xml either direct or from
the org.apache.turbine namespace (like turbine 3.0)
- use ExceptionUtils
- getAbsolutePath cleanup from the devel-mailing-list
- Startup only Component Service always early (Needed for Torque). Removed
Resource and Logging Service.
